posts._title: Abbas Kiarostami – Mossafer aka The Traveller (1974)
posts.title: Mossafer
posts.excerpt: SynopsisThe Traveler is a 1974 Iranian drama film directed by Abbas Kiarostami that tells the story of Hassan Darabi, a troublesome, amoral 10-year-old boy in a small Iranian town. He wishes to see the Iran national football team play an important match in Tehran. In order to achieve that, he scams his friends and neighbors. …

posts._title: Francisco J. Lombardi – Pantaleón y las visitadoras AKA Captain Pantoja and the Special Services (1999)
posts.title: Pantaleón y las visitadoras
posts.excerpt: The Peruvian army captain Pantaleon Pantoja, a very serious and efficient officer, is chosen to set up a special service of ‘visitors’ to satisfy the sexual needs of the soldiers posted on remote jungle outposts. Starring: Salvador del Solar, Angie Cepeda, Mónica Sánchez, Pilar Bardem, Gianfranco Brero, Gustavo Bueno & Carlos Kaniowsky.
posts.titleEnglish: Captain Pantoja and the Special Services

posts.title: Under the Volcano
posts.excerpt: Quote:Against a background of war breaking out in Europe and the Mexican fiesta Day of Death, we are taken through one day in the life of Geoffrey Firmin, a British consul living in alcoholic disrepair and obscurity in a small southern Mexican town in 1939. The Consul’s self-destructive behaviour, perhaps a metaphor for a menaced …

posts._title: Vera Chytilová – Zelená ulice aka Green Street (1959)
posts.title: Zelená ulice
posts.excerpt: Her first foray into documentary filmmaking was a short called Green Street (1959), a look at an over-loaded freight train departing from Prague. Though only nine minutes in length, Chytilová’s astute editing ensured a visual spectacle. An early rare documentary by Věra Chytilová!

posts.title: El ‘Che’ Guevara
posts.excerpt: A good old fashioned story about the Third-World’s attempt to rip off their colonial shackles.

posts._title: Shinji Imaoka – Enjo-kôsai monogatari: shitagaru onna-tachi aka Frog Song (2005)
posts.title: Enjo-kôsai monogatari: shitagaru onna-tachi
posts.excerpt: Quote:Frog Song is a truly innovative example of Pink cinema; a new and exciting movement within Japanese underground filmmaking that mixes erotic content with art film aesthetics to create an unmistakably unique and modern mode of filmmaking. A bizarre film, Frog Song follows Akemi, a young woman who runs off into the night after discovering …

posts._title: Paul Mariano & Kurt Norton – These Amazing Shadows [+Extras] (2011)
posts.title: These Amazing Shadows
posts.excerpt: What do the films Casablanca, Blazing Saddles, and West Side Story have in common? Besides being popular, they have also been deemed “culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant,” by the Library of Congress and listed on the National Film Registry, a roll call of American cinema treasures. posts._title: Jeff Feuerzeig – The Devil and Daniel Johnston (2005)
posts.title: The Devil and Daniel Johnston
posts.excerpt: Quote:Daniel Johnston, manic-depressive genius singer/songwriter/artist is revealed in this portrait of madness, creativity and love. The Devil and Daniel Johnston is a 2005 documentary film about the noted American musician Daniel Johnston. It chronicles Johnston’s life from childhood up to the present, with an emphasis on his experiences with bipolar disorder, and how it manifested …

posts.title: The Resurrected
posts.excerpt: Since the beginning of time, man has struggled with death. Now Charles Dexter Ward, a wealthy scientist, may have found a way to beat it. Using an ancient diary and human remains, Ward begins a terrifying and bloody pursuit for immortality. By the time his wife Claire hires private investigator John March to halt the …

posts._title: Giorgio Simonelli – I baccanali di Tiberio AKA Tiberius (1960)
posts.title: I baccanali di Tiberio
posts.excerpt: Imdb:Cassio, a tourist guide, and Primo, his bus driver, are taking a bus load of tourists to visit villa Jovis, at Capri island. Close to the Salto di Tiberio (Tiberius Fall…) they have an accident, and they knock their heads hard, losing conscience. They come awake in Tiberius villa, in the midst of an orgy, …
